response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is worth $1,000,000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this valuable asset at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer represents an outstanding value, allowing you to secure such a high-quality product at a price that is $50,000 below its true market value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive opportunity.", "product_price": 950000}
